listing.listing_description:
Cinderella-castle stonework hides contemporary interiors at this restored tower above the bay of Isola Bella. Just as a glass railing fits perfectly between the wall’s crenellations, so do sculptural modern furnishings fit seamlessly into open-concept rooms. Watch the sun sparkle on the sea from this hilltop perch or walk to the beach and a cable car to the old town center of Taormina.

Water stretches to the horizon in front of the villa’s sunny terrace—and you can take in the views from a lounger, alfresco sitting and dining areas that can be covered, and a hot tub. There’s also a balcony off the great room that’s an ideal place to sip the day’s first espresso. In the evenings, watch the lights come on in town or tune in to the satellite TV, integrated sound system, and Wi-Fi inside.

Step through an arched doorway and into the sleek, utterly chic living spaces of this luxury property. White walls and pearl-toned floors and ceilings are a pared-down backdrop for lilac sofas, wide-legged dining chairs with seating for 4, and a kitchenette anchored by a brass island. Malachite green panels draw the eye up to the mezzanine level—and a spiral staircase leads there.

The loft area above the great room has a queen bed and access to a hall bathroom. There’s also a second bedroom with a double bed and private ensuite bathroom. The bedrooms share a simple yet sophisticated design philosophy, with cream-colored walls, charcoal bathroom fixtures and brass accents.

Most visitors to Taormina debate whether to stay by the sea or the town center; a holiday at this vacation rental puts you between the beach and the shopping and dining. Though it’s set on the road that runs between, you can walk down to the water or to a cable car that runs to the downtown. Go for a family swim and spot fish in the clear water, explore the town’s ancient Greek theater, or relive your honeymoon over dinner at a restaurant hidden away on a winding street.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Go behind the gates to a peaceful Ibiza enclave at Villa Stephanie. Set in a gated community, this luxury holiday property has plenty of private outdoor space for up to ten guests to bask in the Mediterranean sun. If you’d like to see more of the island, it’s 10 minutes or less to several beaches, and 25 minutes to downtown Ibiza and its lively shops, chic restaurants and famed nightlife.

Sweep through the gates and onto nearby one acre of lush grounds. Stretch out on a lounger or sun bed by the pool, catch up on reading in the shade of one of the outdoor sitting areas or challenge family and friends to games on the lawn. For al-fresco evenings, there’s a barbecue and a canopy-covered dining area that seats ten; if you’d prefer to entertain indoors, there are rustic touches like a wood-burning fireplace alongside high-tech amenities like a sound system, satellite TV and Wi-Fi.

The more than 4,500 square feet of living space at Villa Stephanie are bright and minimalist. In the great room, contemporary architecture is paired with a mix of exotic pieces, from block-like chairs and a stone table to sculptures and vibrant paintings. The open-plan living and dining area and fully equipped kitchen open to the terrace through a series of French doors that also flood the space with light.

There are four bedrooms in the villa’s main house and one in a guest apartment; all five have en-suite bathrooms. Three of the four main-house bedrooms have king beds, including one with a lounge area and one with its own terrace and entrance, and the fourth bedroom has a double bed. The guest apartment has a king bed, private terrace and separate entrance, and could be used as a suite for in-laws or honeymoon-style retreat.

This vacation rental’s location in the Roca Llisa area puts you close to a range of sights and downtown Ibiza. It’s a 10-minute drive or less to three different beaches, including the quiet cove of Cala Olivera and the popular stretch of Cala Llonga. Make the 10-minute walk to tee off at Ibiza Golf Course, or the 25-minute drive to spend a day exploring Old Town Ibiza or a night in one of the famous clubs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Mesmerizing views of Lake Como await at this modern hillside villa in the historic commune of Sala Comacina. Gaze out over the lake’s only island and onto the Costone mountain range from the balcony’s swimming pool and hot tub. For a closer look, head 9 minutes down the hill to Lido di Lenno, check yourself into the beach club for dinner, and take full advantage of the world-class wine list.  

Villa Molli’s modern, semi-industrial interior uses a clutter-free, minimalistic approach to set focus on Lake Como’s incomparable landscape. A mix of contemporary and mid-century modern furniture creates the perfect vantage point to enjoy lake views through floor-to-ceiling openings. Natural elements like teak and slate are complimented by lake-inspired, turquoise throw pillows, giving Molli a slightly nautical-vibe. Dinner on the balcony is highly recommended, especially if you’re bringing in a private chef. And, you’ll appreciate daily housekeeping during your stay.  

Bellagio, known as the pearl of the lake, is a small town made up of narrow alleys, winding cobblestone streets, and some of the most popular bars and restaurants on the lake. Snap a few pics while you wander, and make sure to check out Basilica di San Giacomo, the gardens at Villa Melzi, and the view from Salita Serbelloni. After Bellagio, hop in a water taxi and keep exploring the lake, you’ll find plenty to do in Menaggio, Varenna, and Como Center.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The hillside vineyards of Tuscany shimmer as they’re reflected in the pool at this restored farmhouse near Casole d’Elsa. It’s tucked amid the vines on the grounds of the Casali di Casole, an estate that’s been farmed since the Bronze Age, and shows off its heritage in stone and brick architectural details. Explore forests and fields by bike or on foot, or book a class to taste the terroir.

Watch the sun move across the vineyards from a private glass-tiled infinity pool and the terrace that stretches alongside. After a day spent hiking, biking, or sightseeing in the countryside, sit down to an alfresco dinner at the table for 10 and cozy up to the warmth of the outdoor firepit.

Inside, a traditional Tuscan fireplace warms the living room’s inviting groups of sofas and chairs, casting a golden glow on well-preserved brick archways and matching arched windows. The kitchen is fully equipped with modern conveniences, but keep an eye out for traditional touches like the marble sink. A low wall separates it from the farmhouse-style dining table. Come bedtime, you’ll find the 4 bedrooms spread out between the main house and 2 guest houses in the courtyard for privacy.

The Casali di Casole estate is a microcosm of Tuscany, where you can hike past olive groves and historic castles, discover nearby Casole d’Elsa or join a truffle hunt. Ask your concierge about tee times or a class in painting, ceramics, or cooking.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
In the vicinity of Siracusa —a beautiful and historic city on the Mediterranean—this contemporary home is one of our most eco-friendly luxury villas in Sicily.

A large private swimming pool, open from April to October, features a diving board and spacious wooden deck, complete with lounge chairs. There’s also a private garden to wander through, solarium and a lush lawn. Exercise enthusiasts can keep up their routine in the fitness room, while film buffs can enjoy a movie night in the cinema room. A twice weekly tidying service and linen change is included in the rate.

Inside, the décor is contemporary and stylish, with sleek finishings and pops of color. Eco-friendly technology is used throughout the home which has received a class A rating; features include solar panels, as well as radiant heating and cooling systems. The ground floor’s modern kitchen is equipped with an electric oven, five-burner gas stove, dishwasher and even a terrace with a barbeque.

Up to 14 guests can comfortably stay in this villa’s six bedrooms, which each feature ensuite bathrooms with showers. The master suite boasts a king-sized bed, with a bath and hydro massage shower. In addition to the four bedrooms on the main level, there are two apartment suites downstairs, each with a kitchenette and living area.

This villa is a great base for exploring Sicily’s southeastern regions. If you’re looking for a bit of surf and sand, the sandy shores of Fontane Bianche are just 14 km away. Local shops, restaurants and the Monasteri Golf Club are even closer at hand.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find yourself at home in the rolling hills of Tuscany at Villa Lunablu. Parts of this luxury vacation rental near Montepulciano were first built in the 16th century, followed by updates in the 18th century, and the property still looks out over the timeless landscape from the Val de Chiana to Monte Cetona. Use the spacious private grounds and garden and five bedrooms as the setting for a quiet family reunion or an intimate destination wedding, or simply as a base to explore the region’s historic sites and world-famous vineyards.

Set at the end of a winding gravel road, the villa is surrounded by olive groves and gardens with mature cypress and pine trees. Its multiple levels open to three terraces that follow the gentle slope of the hillside location and feature al-fresco sitting and dining areas, as well as barbecues where you can prepare meals to enjoy outside. A path leads down to the pool area, where you’ll find an infinity pool, a deck with loungers, an outdoor shower and a bar, and a bocce court.

Though the traditional tiled roof, stone walls and shuttered windows of Villa Lunablu speak to the home’s history, the lovingly updated interiors ensure that guests with twenty-first-century expectations will stay in comfort. Cotto floors and brick-clad archways invite you to wander from the casual sitting room to the farmhouse-inspired table and chairs in the dining room. Two kitchens—one professional, one fully equipped and eat-in—make it easy to prepare and serve local specialties or family favorites.

Each of the villa’s five bedrooms has a double bed. Two have en-suite bathrooms, two share a bathroom, and one has access to a shared hall bathroom. Details like vaulted and beamed ceilings, exposed stone walls and antique fireplace surrounds ground the bedrooms’ decor in centuries of Italian style, while large windows opening to the countryside are a constant reminder of the beautiful surroundings.

Whether you’re on holiday with family, enjoying an escape with friends, or on honeymoon, there’s plenty to do near Villa Lunablu. Make the 15-minute drive to the town of Cetona for a look at prehistoric and Bronze Age archaeological finds from the area, the 15-minute drive to the newer village of Piazze, or the 35-minute drive to stroll the picturesque, car-free streets of the hill town of Montepulciano. Tennis courts and a golf course are also within easy reach, and as you pass through the countryside, be sure to stop off at local producers and sample the region’s famous wines, olive oils, cheeses and honey.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Contemporary design meets village life at Villa Fabienne. Recently restored by the renowned Blakstad Design Studio, this Ibiza vacation rental pairs sleek furnishings with traditional architectural charm. Its location in the countryside is just outside the town of Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera and a short drive from several beaches.

Look out over hillsides covered in Tempranillo wine grapes and smell the lavender growing nearby from a sun-splashed terrace with a swimming pool, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue. Start each morning of your holiday on the right foot with a cup from the Nespresso machine, and end on a relaxed note with the help of the fireplace, cable TV and Wi-Fi.

During the restoration, Blakstad preserved the architectural details of this luxury property while creating an inviting open-concept great room with plenty of space to gather with friends and family. Beamed ceilings and a stone wall add warmth to the living and dining areas. The adjacent kitchen is fully equipped and super-sleek, but has a welcoming breakfast bar.

Villa Fabienne has one master bedroom with a queen bed, private en-suite bathroom and terrace access. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, and share access to a hall bathroom. For your comfort, all three bedrooms have air conditioning.

Though it feels like a rural retreat, Villa Fabienne is less than a 10-minute drive from the village of Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, where you can pick up provisions, have dinner or wander charming streets. It’s also a short drive from several popular beaches and the resort town of Santa Eularia des Riu. Don’t miss the chance to drive in to Ibiza Town, whether you marvel at its historic sites or relive your honeymoon on an evening out.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stone pathways lead from this lovingly-restored Italian home to a vivid blue swimming pool that overlooks a nearby forest. Inside, rustic brick arches divide spacious rooms featuring finely-crafted furniture and relaxed ambience. At the shaded, viewpoint garden table, guests can plan trips to the medieval village of Rapale, generations-old family trattorias, and Siena’s world-famous piazza.

Sunrise at Borgo Gerlino bathes the surrounding woodland, plantations and olive trees in golden light, before spreading across the traditional tiled roof and rich, mottled stone exterior of the home. Guests are served with a delicious breakfast courtesy of the home’s fully equipped kitchen, with a selection of airy alfresco dining spots in the garden. Easily prepare for the day with the home’s 9 ensuite bathrooms, complete with ample space and tiled elegance. As the morning heats up, a comprehensive heating / cooling system ensures the ideal climate is retained. After a full day exploring the locality, relax in the garden with a sunset banquet of local dishes and vibrant wine.

The culinary wealth and visual appeal of rural Tuscany is yours to experience from Borgo Gerlino. The hilltop village of Rapale, replete with quiet lanes and fairytale stone towers, is within walking distance. A short drive through lush countryside and olive plantations will bring guests to pleasant roadside restaurants and wineries, where the region’s bounty can be savored. Drink in the frescos and ancient convent at Monte San Savino, or take in the antique splendor of the UNESCO-listed Piazza del Campo in Siena.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Within Lavadins ancient stone walls exists a carefully renovated demonstration of modern style unobtrusively integrating with old-world architecture. Located on a generous south-facing estate, rich with trees, gardens, and fields of lavender, you'll love exploring the property, and maybe even host a special outdoor event as well. With views of rugged mountains and the countryside villages of Bonnieux and Lacoste, it's easy to see how Provence became the muse for famous works of art by the likes of Picasso and Van Gogh. France's Provencal region is rich with history and art, and it's yours to discover on your next amazing Luxury Retreats vacation.

Elegant modern furniture and state of the art electronics mix with exposed wood beams and natural stone walls throughout Lavadins open-concept interior. The high-vaulted ceilings, numerous openings to the terrace, and earthy color scheme give the house an inviting, open-air atmosphere. In the living room, the fireplace is the focal point. Surrounded by plush couches, it's a warm, relaxing space to enjoy some alone time or gather with the whole group.

If you're planning a special event, Lavadins is as beautiful a setting as it is practical. With parking for ten vehicles, formal and alfresco dining, both with seating for fourteen, and three fully-equipped kitchens, hosting is a breeze. The bedrooms at Lavandins are divided into five individual suites, adding extra privacy as you navigate around its vast estate. Outside, you'll find several furnished sitting areas, a swimming pool, a barbecue area, and fountains, all amongst lush provencal greenery.

Once you've explored the wineries, cafes, and historical sites amongst the small villages in the distance, consider a day trip to France's prized cultural hub, Marseille. Well worth the hour and a half drive, Marseille is a vibrant metropolis, well known for its fine cuisine, art galleries and museums, fashion, beaches, and historical architecture. If you'd like to see some of the paintings that the Provence Region has inspired visit Musee Cantini, and Musee Regards de Provence.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set on a leafy Corfu hillcrest, this elegant and sophisticated villa combines old world charm with rich and warm furnishings. From the sprawling garden terrace, look down on a sheltered inlet where a scattering of yachts rest at anchor. Bright, cream-colored interiors, pleasing furnishings, and antique touches perfect the home, with tranquil beaches, boat trips and welcoming tavernas nearby. 

Breakfast in the group dining room at Shell House is always a pleasant experience, as guests gather around the long table as morning sunshine creeps inside. The calm, vegetation-wreathed terrace offers numerous carved seats, ideal for quiet reading or flavorsome glass of Greek iced coffee. Prepare for the day’s outings in the sitting room, complete with impressive fireplace and soft couches, before departing through the home’s grand doorway. After an active day taking in this storied coastline, slip into the home’s pool for a refreshing swim, or visit the sauna as the smell of delicious cooking circulates throughout the villa.

Shell House provides quick access to an exceptional range of attractions, including several tranquil pebble beaches with crystal clear water. Set off on a sun-drenched day cruise on a local yacht through the waters of the island’s channel, or wind your way through impressive mountain valleys to the ancient monastery at Pankrator, which offers exceptional views as far as the Albanian coastline. Visit local tavernas for distinctly characterful Corfu dishes, or drop by the island’s friendly wineries to discover flavors from across the region. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set on 25-hectares in the heart of Umbria, including a private lake and vegetable garden, this fairytale-like farmhouse is the escape you’ve been waiting for. Use the chef’s kitchen to prepare fresh, organic meals for loved ones. Dine alfresco amongst the fragrant gardens, water features, and olive trees. If you’re feeling adventurous, take a day trip to visit the wonders of Rome.

Built from stone and timber, this restored farmhouse is Umbria-authentic from the clay-shingled roof to the terracotta floors. Stately modern updates inside add a touch of elegance to the rugged-chic atmosphere, reminding guests of Italy’s natural beauty while pampering to their every whim. Arched doorways connect each chandelier-lit room, and flow out to the terrace, inviting the fresh breeze to join the party. 

Sip your morning coffee under the shaded pergola and catch up on some reading before the rest of the group wakes up. Work on your tan from one of the poolside sun loungers, hopping in when it gets too hot out. For lunch, pick some greens and vegetables from the garden for a farm-to-table salad. At night, light a fire and curl up with the family for popcorn and a movie on the plush living room sofa.

Charge your camera batteries before you head to Paciano, a 14th-century medieval village about 15-minutes from home. Spend the day wandering narrow alleys, winding cobblestone streets, and snapping pics of ancient churches and castles. If there’s a golfer in the group, Lamborghini Panicale Golf Club is beautiful 9-hole that follows vineyards and Lake Trasimeno before finishing at their clubhouse restaurant.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Look out over olive groves, rolling hills, and the mountains of Goult at this elegant, French farmhouse. Throw an amazing event or destination wedding on this spacious estate with room for 18. Dine alfresco beneath the stars after selecting the perfect pairing from the wine cellar. The next morning, set out to explore iconic Provencal cities, like Aix, Arles, and Avignon or arrange a wine tasting tour with a wine master at the estate winery.

Outlined in ancient stone, this lush property contains tennis and petanque courts, lush gardens, and a wide range of outdoor social settings. On hot days, work on your tan from a poolside lounger or hop in to beat the heat. On casual occasions, pick up something fresh from a local market and fire up the charcoal grill. At night, set the kids up with a movie in the star-lit theatre and mix up a few classic cocktails to enjoy with old friends on the terrace. Later, move the party to the games room for a billiards tournament or whip up some late-night snacks in the outdoor kitchen. You’ll also be able to keep up with everyday routines in the office space and home gym.

Many believe Gordes to be the most beautiful hilltop village in France. If you’re a fan of Renaissance architecture, wandering narrow winding alleyways, and discovering fantastic restaurants, then it’s definitely worth deciding for yourself. After spending time in one of Provence’s smaller cities, move on to Avignon, a bustling port town known for its popular cultural festivals.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience an exciting blend of eye-catching Venice street views and luxurious interiors at this conveniently-located apartment. Offering everything guests could want from a city apartment, from spacious, well-furnished bedrooms and bathrooms, to plush living spaces, this is the ideal choice for sight-seeing stay in the City of Bridges, with major attractions and fine dining a short walk away.

A blend of light colors and exposed white rafters typify this home, amplifying light and ensure a bright and attractive environment. Decadently outfitted in rich Italian furnishings and crafted furniture, guests can relax in style in the living space after a long day spent exploring the cultural riches of the city. Begin the day by sipping coffee and taking in the bird’s-eye view of the flag-decked square below, and end it after a day walking the city’s echoing laneways by climbing into a welcoming double bed, or freshening up at the marble-topped counters of the huge bathrooms

From this apartment, guests can easily experience the sights and sounds of this canal city. Take a short walk to the waterfront and catch a water taxi, taking in the gliding gondolas and arched bridges of the old town. Just a short walk away are sights like the Scuola Grande di San Marco, a fantastic example of classical Italian architecture, replete with stone arches and imposing statues. The gastronomic specialties of the city, like local bigołi in salsa or tasty nougat bars, are on your doorstep and waiting to be tasted.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Ruby is a stunning luxury home on the northeast coast of Mallorca, with sweeping views of the Canyamel Valley. Part of Cap Vermell Estate, an exclusive community of twelve detached villas, the home enjoys a private, 1,830-square-meter estate and a prime location within minutes of the beach and golf course. The beautifully constructed villa balances the rustic charm and craftsmanship of this famed Spanish island with superb modern comforts, including a voluminous private swimming pool (with retractable cover) and a designer kitchen. Additionally, the vacation rental includes discounted access to Cap Vermell Country Club and other communal amenities. Four comfortable bedrooms accommodate seven guests, with additional bedding available upon request.

Set amid citrus groves and vine-clad stone walls, the villa's outdoor living areas invite you to savor the open-air pleasures of the Balearic Islands. Plunge into the pool for a soothing swim, sunbathe on the ample tanning shelf, and sip cool drinks in the shade of the veranda. Relish an afternoon meal alfresco, and kindle the veranda's fireplace in the evening, sipping Spanish wine or Mallorcan palo (a traditional local spirit).

The luminous interiors feature an open-concept layout around the central floating staircase. Beautifully upholstered sofas face a high-end home entertainment system in the main sitting area, while the hearth-warmed dining room seats eight around a square table of natural wood, illuminated by large lanterns. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and serves the dining room through a lovely window bar. Smaller sitting areas and dens throughout the home provide quiet havens for private downtime. Comprehensive air conditioning and heating ensure comfort in all seasons.

The bedrooms are furnished simply yet comfortably, forming dreamy abodes for afternoon siestas or peaceful nights. Three of the rooms open directly to the ground-level terrace or spacious upper balcony. All four enjoy ensuite bathrooms, three of which include deep soaking tubs and exquisite marble surfaces.

Villa Ruby is just a few minutes from the highly regarded Canyamel Golf Course as well as Canyamel Beach, while several of Spain's finest beaches are within easy reach by car. Cap Vermell Country Club offers a wide array of sport and wellness amenities as well as delicious, health-conscious cuisine.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Feel the warm countryside breeze while you lounge by the pool at this renovated farmhouse in Chateaurenard. Hop in for a quick lap and then fix yourself a snack in the summer kitchen underneath the shaded pool house. Then, wander through fragrant gardens and olive groves before heading out to dinner at Table de Nicolas for traditional French cuisine, 11 kilometers away in St. Remy de Provence.

Situated on 1 hectare of private, expertly manicured lawns, Mas Prestige is split between the main house, guest house, and studio. Stone walkways and lush lawns connect each separate building, adding an extra touch of privacy to the estate. Inside, stretch out on the sofa by the wood-burning fireplace, get creative in the chef’s kitchen, and pamper yourself in the spa-like ensuites.

Mas Prestige comes with 5 parking spaces and 2 alfresco dining areas, so don’t be afraid to invite new friends over for dinner. Stir up a few cocktails and gather in the outdoor lounge, enjoying the countryside scenery as the sun sets. If the party goes late, fire up the charcoal grill for a late-night snack in the pool house lounge. Then, retire to the warm fire next to the master suite’s king bed.

St. Remy de Provence is an incredible place to eat and drink, so work up an appetite by hiking through Alpilles Natural Regional Park. Most trails lead to scenic lookouts, so make sure to bring a camera. Then, have a light lunch at Maison Cambillau, famous for their Provencal flatbread. At dinner, Les Filles du Patissier features a new menu of fresh ingredients every day, and it’s set in a bustling square in the old town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Steal away to a private setting to revel in the Algarvian sunshine at Villa M49. Part of Pine Cliffs, a Luxury Collection Resort, this beautifully appointed vacation rental is a modern haven just minutes from the beach. Take advantage of the resort's shared amenities for an active family holiday, or hide out at the villa for a honeymoon-style romantic escape.

Spend days relaxing around the villa's pool in al-fresco living areas with an ample supply of loungers, a barbecue, outdoor dining for eight and a hot tub. In the evenings, gather around the indoor wood-burning fireplace or TV and DVD player, or keep in touch with friends and family at home via Wi-Fi.

The bright, contemporary living spaces at Villa M49 stretch out parallel to the pool terrace, flooded with light by walls of doors and windows. Marbled stone floors are a sophisticated base for the sleek furnishings in the living room, while in the formal dining room, a brick ceiling adds a touch of coziness and warmth. In the fully equipped kitchen, you'll find conveniences such as an espresso machine as well as a breakfast table.

The villa's four bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to eight. There are three bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, two of which open to balconies, and one bedroom with two twin beds, an en-suite bathroom and terrace access.

Guests of Villa M49 are welcome at the beach and health clubs, games room, indoor and outdoor pools, driving range and golf course at Pine Cliffs; additional costs may apply to some activities. Bring the whole family to the mini-golf course, rent bicycles and pedal around the area, or borrow water sports equipment for a beach day. Luckily, the Central Algarve location puts you just minutes from the dramatic cliffs and golden sands of beaches like Praia de Falésia.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
La Ferme des Petites Frasses is a gorgeous alpine chalet in the French Alps near Megève. Situated just five kilometers from the town center and minutes from the lifts, the chalet sits on nine acres of beautiful alpine meadows and woods and features panoramic valley and mountain views. Ample alfresco living areas invite you to sip the crisp mountain air, while spacious and rustic interiors, outfitted with fine contemporary amenities and spa facilities, keep downtime festive and relaxing in any season. Six bedrooms and a children's rom accommodate fourteen guests, making the chalet an ideal choice for large or multiple families. A private helicopter pad ensures easy access to nearby airports and other alpine destinations.

The villa's ground floor and adjoining terrace are perfectly designed for winter coziness and summer refreshment. Outside, a hot tub beckons you to soak your muscles in its bubbly warmth, while the dining area is ideal for mountain-view meals in the pine-scented air. Indoors, low ceilings of fine timber and exposed beams create a cozy chalet ambiance, while multiple lounges invite you to savor mulled wine by the fire after a day on the slopes. The bucolic kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, while the beautiful dining table gazes out on sublime mountain views. The villa's sauna and Hammam will refresh your body and mind before your next adventure.

The chalet's first floor features six bedrooms with king beds, all of which can be converted into two twins. Three of them open directly to the balcony, and two enjoy direct access to the Hammam and sauna. Bedroom two enjoys views of Mont Blanc. On the second floor is another king bedroom as well as a children's room with twin bed. These bedrooms share a bathroom with jetted tub.

Le Ferme des Petit Frasses enjoys a fine balance of privacy and proximity to the slopes and après-ski activities of this alpine capital. You're just minutes from Christomet and Prés lifts and five minutes from the heart of Megève.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Make your trip to the Amalfi Coast truly a stay on the coast at Amalfi Horizon. True to its name, the four-bedroom villa is set on a cliff near Sorrento, where there’s nothing between you and stunning views of sea and sky. You’ll want to take in the panorama from every level of the house, garden and terraces, but be sure to make time for the short jaunt to Sorrento or the beach during your stay.

Once you pass through the gates of Amalfi Horizon and continue through the house, the sunny terrace overlooking the ocean is irresistible. A retractable awning means you can dine al-fresco in sun or shade, and there’s a covered sitting area for napping or reading. Just beyond the terrace is the infinity pool, terrace with chaise longues, and steps down to a series of terraces closer to the water. There’s also a hot tub, outdoor shower, small gym area and a barbecue. Inside, the house has Wi-Fi, a television and DVD player and both air conditioning and a fireplace.

The villa’s interiors are traditional and cozy, with welcoming wood floors and soothing white walls. Blue sofas and seashell artwork are nods to the ocean in the living room, while a corner fireplace makes the room inviting year-round. The adjacent dining area seats eight around a classic wooden table, while a gold-edged mirror is a touch of glam. A charming eat-in kitchen has a cheerful tile backsplash and beautiful stone counters and is fully equipped.

Amalfi Horizon has two bedrooms on its ground floor and two bedrooms on its lower level, all of which have air conditioning and televisions. On the ground floor, there’s one bedroom with a double bed, terrace access and ocean view and one bedroom with two twin beds, which can be combined to form a king. These two bedrooms share a bathroom. On the lower level, each of the two bedrooms has a queen bed, en-suite bathroom and access to the terrace.

As its name implies, Amalfi Horizon is in the center of the sights of the Amalfi coast. From the villa, it’s 7 km to Sorrento, 4 km to Leonelli Beach, 9 km to Positano, 17 km to Praiano and 30 km to Amalfi. If you’re arriving or departing by air, the most convenient airport is in Naples, 50 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
One of the most remarkable Puglia villa rentals available, this restored 16th-century masseria (fortified farmhouse) stands proudly on the ancient Appian Way. If you are looking for a luxurious holiday retreat brimming with character and history, this stunning property is for you.

Deep in the countryside and surrounded by olive groves, Villa Pizzorusso is the ideal place to get away from it all. The secluded gardens, filled with orange trees and aromatic herbs, are wonderfully private, and you’ll love the magnificent 80 ft (25 m) swimming pool. Enjoy a morning coffee or early evening aperitif on the extensive first-floor terrace and take in the views across the peaceful landscape.

The character of the grand old masseria is still in evidence throughout. Enter the interior through the arched portal and step into a world of barrel-vaulted ceilings, stone arches and a wealth of period details that wouldn’t look out of place on a film set. Different parts of the building date from different eras: the main wing, complete with five cupolas and frescoed ceilings, was added in the 18th century, while the main living area – including an open-plan kitchen – is located within the 17th-century stables.

There’s plenty of space to accommodate up to twelve guests. Each bedroom is air-conditioned and simply furnished with neutral tones and traditional wood furniture, while the bathrooms feature striking contemporary fixtures. Four of the bedrooms are located in the main villa with the two upstairs bedrooms having private entrances and secluded access from the ground floor, while two more are located in a smaller stone building in the courtyard.

There is much to see and do in the area – from the beaches of the Ionian and Adriatic coasts, to the whimsical conical architecture of the local trulli dwellings. Gourmet travelers should stop at the charming local market town of Mesagne, with its bakeries, wine co-ops and cheese shops (the fresh mozzarella and ricotta are made daily). Puglia is also rich in picturesque medieval cities, such as Ostuni and Otranto, their atmospheric narrow streets lined with an abundance of restaurants specializing in the delectable local cuisine.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience living in the pleasant surrounds of Queen’s Park with this fully refurbished and colorfully-outfitted terrace home. A combination of classic layout and Edwardian influences blends with modern fixtures and stylistic touches. A sunny, flower-filled garden fills the view from the kitchen, with Central London nicely close by.

Balanced style is present in abundance in each room of this home, from the inventive lighting that rises alongside the polished stone and rich wooden walls of the kitchen, to the rich, blackened chairs that guests will appreciate settling into at mealtime. Useful and effective clothing storage is present in the comfortable bedrooms, which come with their own distinct personalities and attractive fixtures. A suntrap terrace ensures guests always have a great hang-out spot when the sun shines, which is lined with leafy plants and squishy cushions. Located in a classically English terrace home, entering and leaving the home is always simple and direct.

Queen’s Park is the ideal neighborhood from which to experience the best that London has to offer. Just a short drive, or trip by tube (subway) will bring guests to famous locations including the leafy pathways of Kensington Gardens, the grand entrance of Buckingham Palace, and the eagle-eye view of the London Eye ferris wheel. With a galaxy of restaurants and shopping outlets available for all tastes, local options include dozens of welcoming pubs and historic sports grounds, including the soccer hub of Loftus Road.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

For guests travelling in the warmer months, please note that air conditioning is not available at this property.

listing.listing_description:
Find yourself in the heart of one of London’s chicest neighborhoods at Mayfair Arcade. Not only is this luxury apartment centrally located, a recent renovation means it’s just as stylish as its surroundings. Its three bedrooms are just the right size for a small family, three couples or one couple on a decadent honeymoon-style city break.

Start each day of your holiday on the right note with a cup from the espresso machine, and finish by unwinding in front of the satellite TV and Wi-Fi. No matter what the London weather does, you’ll stay comfortable thanks to heating and air conditioning.

The villa’s open-concept great room is filled with modern pieces selected by a renowned interior designer. The vibe is contemporary yet welcoming, with details such as parquet floors, a tuxedo sofa and Eames-inspired dining chairs in the living and dining areas. The streamlined kitchen is fully equipped and open to the rest of the room.

This vacation rental has one master bedroom with a king bed and two bedrooms with queen beds. All three bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and TVs. Like the great room, the bedrooms are thoughtfully appointed spaces with parquet floors and built-in closets, and features like glass-walled showers give the bathrooms spa-worthy appeal.

Mayfair Arcade is steps from Brown’s Hotel, The Ritz and an array of shops along Bond Street. It’s less than a 10-minute walk to Piccadilly Circus and the nearest Tube station, which will take you almost anywhere you want to go, and a short drive from must-see attractions from Buckingham Palace to Big Ben. You’ll quickly make a habit of taking a morning stroll through nearby Hyde Park and ending the day with a drink at one of the many cosmopolitan bars and restaurants in the area.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover Sicily’s timeless beauty from this stone-clad villa steps away from Minareto Beach in Siracusa. Embrace the ease of resort life, while lush private gardens and stone walls carve out a secluded piece of the peninsula just for you. After a day on the beach, treat yourself to a traditional Sicilian dinner and a little shopping on the winding streets of Siracusa.

Work on your tan in one of the poolside sun loungers on the back patio. When you’re ready to cool off, jump into the plunge pool for instant refreshment. Then, move inside to the air conditioning to catch up on some ready in a leather armchair. If you’re feeling inspired, try your hand at Sicilian cuisine in the kitchen and whip up a light lunch to enjoy at the alfresco set.

If you’re committed to any workout routines, the Minareto Resort has a fully-equipped gym that is ready when you are. Keep up with the rest of the World on Wi-Fi and satellite television. If you want. And, check out the resort’s list of add-on features to customize your vacation. The villa comes with housekeeping, parking, and access to the private beach.

Take a walking tour of Siracusa and see what it’s like to be a local. Stop in for fresh pastries at family-owned bakeries, sample wine from nearby vineyards, and dine at some of the city’s most buzzing patio restaurants. The next day, plan a trip to Noto, Ragusa, or Taormina, all of which are drivable in an hour or so. Or visit Mount Etna Volcano, the still-active stratovolcano, 105 kilometers from home.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Donna Cecilia is a luxury villa located in the picturesque Selinute area of Sicily. The villa is situated within an expansive fairy tale estate, adorned with plenty of citrus and olive trees. Donna Cecilia is the perfect example of living in chic Italian style, and experiencing that sweet idleness known as dolce far niente.

This beautiful villa is set in an oasis free from atmospheric and noise pollution, so it is ideal for families, as well as sun seekers and nature lovers. The villa is the perfect holiday solution for guests seeking contact with nature in the unspoiled countryside of Sicily, not far from the wonderful Mediterranean Sea. Two porches, one leading to the alfresco dining and barbeque area and one to the socializing area, face out to the meadow, interrupted only by the blue of the swimming pool surrounded by characteristic dry-stone walls. Indoors, you will find a television, Wi-Fi access, air conditioning and heating.

On crossing the entrance, you will discover a welcoming living room, decorated with elegant touches of old wood. The large windows allow you to admire the delightful garden outside. A comfortable, fully equipped kitchen illuminated by a large full-length window completes the villa.

The three bedrooms at Donna Cecilia, each with an en-suite bathroom, are on the same level as the living room. All of the pristine suites offer double beds and easy access to the exteriors. Donna Cecilia can accommodate up to six fortunate guests.

Donna Cecilia villa is nestled in a unique setting, surrounded by natural reserves of rare beauty, archaeological sites, places of great historical significance with monuments and churches. This destination is ideal for those who want to enjoy fascinating places in addition to the peace of the beaches and the beauty of the sea. But not to be forgotten are the unique cultural and gastronomic traditions, such as the historic cellars and oil mills where you can taste world famous Sicilian delicacies. Your dream villa awaits!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The past meets the present in spectacular fashion at Finca Can Basso. An authentic finca in the countryside near Santa Eularia des Riu, this traditional property has been renovated to standards of magazine-worthy luxury. Make it the backdrop to a relaxed holiday with family or a stylish Ibiza getaway with friends.

Set amid more than six acres of land dotted with stone walls and almond, olive and fruit trees, Finca Can Basso is a tranquil world unto itself. Bask in the Mediterranean sun on a lounger on the terrace, swim in the huge private pool or sip wine at the al-fresco dining area. In the evenings, serve drinks from the bar, settle in by the TV and sound system, or stay in touch via Wi-Fi.

A thoughtful blend of the traditional and modern distinguishes the interiors of this one-of-a-kind vacation rental. Wall-to-wall glass and a sleek sectional are paired with a sturdy wooden door in the living room, while in the dining room, a beamed ceiling balances out the sculptural chairs. Stone walls set off the ultra-minimalist workspace and appliances in the fully equipped kitchen.

There are four bedrooms in the villa’s main house—all with king beds and en-suite bathrooms—and two in guest suites with en-suite bathrooms and a double bed and king bed, respectively. External access to the guest suites means they can double as a honeymoon-style retreat or quieter accommodations for in-laws.

Though Finca Can Basso feels like a secluded haven, it’s only a short drive from restaurants, shops and nightlife in the oceanfront town of Santa Eularia des Riu. Spend a day at the beach just minutes from the town center at Platja de Santa Eulalia, or drive the winding roads to picturesque Cala Llonga. For the ultimate night out, Ibiza Town is within easy reach by car.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
World-class skiing awaits in Val D'Isere. Located amongst the French Alps, this prestigious village and ski resort have hosted FIS World Ski Competitions, The Olympics, and countless other major alpine tournaments. From Chalet Ebene's luxurious five-bedroom estate, you'll be right in the heart of it all. With just a five minute walk to both the Village center, and Val D'Isere ski access, Chalet Ebene is the perfect home base for your next Luxury Retreats vacation.

After a long day on the mountain, Chalet Ebene is exactly the warm, welcoming home that you're hoping for. Open-concept design, vaulted ceilings, and plush designer furniture set a cozy tone. First, stash your wet ski gear in the ski-storage room, then warm up in the sauna. After that, stretch out on the sofa in front of the roaring wood-fireplace. In the kitchen, granite countertops and state of the art appliances will make meal prep a breeze. And, with formal dining for twelve, you and your guests will all be able to dine together, recounting stories from an exciting day on the slopes.

After dinner, Ebene has a cinema room, hammam, indoor pool, and massage room, perfect for relaxing and rejuvenating. Wi-Fi, television, and a washer/dryer will make you feel at home. If you feel like visiting La Mourra Hotel, you'll have shared access to their restaurant, bar, and spa. And, to make your stay even easier, Ebene comes with housekeeping, a butler, shuttle service, welcome gifts, and more.

Nearby in the village's downtown area, you'll find vibrant bars, boutique shops, fine dining, and exciting nightlife on Avenue Olympique. Be sure to bring a camera on your journey into town, as it's well known for its gorgeous chalet-style architecture, and historical sites. And, when it's time to hit the slopes, you'll have quick and easy access, just a short walk from your luxurious mountain getaway.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Chalet Toundra is a spectacular private chalet in Verbier, Switzerland, situated just a minute's drive from the Savoleyres lift station and Carrefour ski trail. Featuring breathtaking mountain views, exquisite spaces for relaxation and entertainment, and a "Catered" option that includes deluxe chef, host, and ski instructions services, this four-bedroom vacation rental is the perfect choice for family ski getaways, destination wedding guests, and alpine adventurers seeking privacy and comfort in the heart of the Swiss Alps.

Perched on a verdant hillside, the chalet is designed in classic alpine style, with gabled roof and timber walls supported by a foundation of beautiful exposed stone. Entering on the ground floor, where ski warmers and boot storage are located, you'll ascend one floor to the luminous and spacious Great Room. Here, floor-to-ceiling windows gaze out on panoramic views of the Petit and Grand Combin mountain range, while cozy living areas set the stage for warm, festive times. Enjoy pre-dinner cocktails and appetizers in the sumptuous lounge, staying toasty by the superb stone fireplace and watching your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV. Step onto the ample outdoor balcony to behold the sublime vistas, lingering in the warmer months on lovely outdoor furniture. The open kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, and the dining table invites you to mountain-view feasts, morning and night. With gorgeous ceilings of pickled wood and exposed beams, elegant yet cozy furnishings, and charming decorative detail, the chalet possesses an ambiance of pure alpine elegance.

The four bedrooms—one on the top floor, three on the ground—feature wood-paneled walls and a deliciously cozy feel. The top-floor suite features a king bed and ensuite bathroom, while on the ground floor, there is a bedroom with king bed (or two twins) and ensuite bathroom, as well as a bedroom with a double bed and a children's bunk room, sharing a hallway bathroom between them.

Chalet Toundra enjoys a lovely location for enjoying serene seclusion and total convenience at once. The slopes of Les 4 Vallées are just a minute away at Savoleyres, or you can access them at Carrefour or Médran, both a short drive from your door. Place Central in lively downtown Verbier is just three minutes by car.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This stunning villa is situated on ample private grounds outside the town of Cassis on the Cote d'Azur of France. Formerly the Hotel Revestel, the villa was renovated by its owners in 2017 to offer an exquisite blend of vintage French elegance, rustic simplicity, and contemporary comfort. The 600-square-meter waterfront home features expansive outdoor living areas with panoramic views of the Bay of Cassis, along with spacious interiors infused with natural light. There is a private access to a beautiful beach with turquoise waters in less than five minutes by foot. Nine bedrooms accommodate families and groups up to eighteen in size. With 2 new additional bedrooms available as of February 2020, groups can go up to 24.

The fabulous terrace and grounds invite you to dreamy hours under the Mediterranean sky. Enjoy games of pétanque in the yard, plunge into the saltwater pool, and bask in the sunlight on the beautiful wooden deck. Follow the antique stairs to the upper terrace, with its classic balustrade and sublime views of the bay's turquoise expanse, for alfresco meals and intimate gatherings over bottles of local wine. Twin pergolas cast gentle shadows in the afternoon, while their lovely pendant lanterns illuminate your nighttime festivities.

The villa's interior living areas and kitchen open directly to the terrace, creating a graceful flow of space for dinner parties or relaxing hours with loved-ones. Luminous white walls, natural wood floors, and simple yet elegant furnishings accentuate the rich natural beauty of the coastal countryside. The kitchen will inspire the gourmet chefs among you, with high-grade contemporary appliances, a wine fridge, and an extensive bar. Savor aperitifs in the salon as the kids play in the game room, before gathering for memorable feasts.

The master suite features a king bed, lounge area, and large private balcony with extraordinary views of the bay, while its deluxe ensuite bathroom includes a dual shower and a soaking tub beside a wide picture window. The guestrooms vary in size and bedding arrangement; all but one have ensuite bathrooms, and most enjoy views of the bay or gardens.

Domaine de Canaille balances privileged privacy with convenient access to the riches of the Cote d'Azur. Enjoy a lovely walk to the Port of Cassis, exploring the area's famed falaises (cliffs), calanques (inlets), and beaches. Take a short drive west to Marseilles, or venture north for a daytrip to Aix-en-Provence.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Play is at the heart of this traditional-turned-chic Ibiza villa, whether it’s a bicycle whimsically hung on the wall of the dining room or a tennis court with room for five-a-side soccer, too. Nearly 5,000 square feet of outdoor living space, spread across an acre of private grounds, make it easy to get some sunshine. In 10 minutes, you can be sampling cheeses at the market in Ibiza’s Old Town.

 In addition to the tennis court, the grounds feature a swimming pool, a terrace with plenty of loungers, and a shaded al-fresco dining area with a barbecue. After the last volley or cannonball of the evening, head inside to watch cable TV, share holiday photos via Wi-Fi, or, on cooler evenings, cozy up to the fireplace.

 Step through huge sliding glass doors from the terrace into the living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen, whose beamed ceilings and wood-fronted cabinets both nod to traditional island homes and create a visual link between the spaces. An eclectic mix of artwork, including that suspended bicycle, adds personality, while details such as built-in shelving show a practical side.

 There are three bedrooms with queen beds in the main house at this vacation rental: one with an en-suite bathroom, and two that share a hall bathroom. There’s also one bedroom in a garden cottage which, with its king bed, en-suite bathroom, and kitchenette, is perfect for couples seeking honeymoon-style privacy.

 This luxury property is a 10-minute drive from Ibiza, where you can browse shops hidden away on medieval streets, sightsee along the 16th-century walls as a family, sit down for an afternoon refreshment at a café, or dance the night away at a club. It’s also close to the Sant Josep de sa Talaia area, which has both quieter fishing villages and nightlife to experience.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A serene atmosphere, stunning views and one of the best beaches on Ibiza: you’ll find it all at Villa Vista Cala Jondal. As its name implies, the villa has panoramic views of the beach at Cala Jondal; what’s not mentioned is the location close to the airport and town of Ibiza, so you can be on that beach in no time. But six suite-style bedrooms, luxe amenities and modern architecture make the villa a place you’ll want to stay.

In front of the villa, a long terrace and infinity pool stretch out toward the sea, surrounded by palm and orange trees and flower beds. You could easily spend the day relaxing in the chaise longues and hammock on the terrace or just as easily follow the path down to the tennis court. Find a respite from the midday heat in the shaded al-fresco lounge area, and as the sun sets, cook local seafood on the barbecue and enjoy at the outdoor dining area. Spend a romantic evening on the rooftop terrace, which has its own lounge area. For comfort and convenience, the villa has air conditioning and Wi-Fi; for pure fun, it has a ping-pong table, too.

The monochromatic white color scheme at Villa Vista Cala Jondal creates a calm, sophisticated atmosphere that’s enlivened by texture. In the living room, which opens to the terrace via two sets of sliding doors and offers excellent views, a shag rug is a plush base for a sleek white sectional, silver lounge chair and glossy white cabinets. Just through an open doorway is the dining room, which seats ten in Lucite chairs around a white Parsons table. The kitchen is adjacent to the dining area and hides a full set of equipment behind minimalist white surfaces.

There are five bedrooms in the main house at Villa Vista Cala Jondal and one in the guest house; all six have en-suite bathrooms with stand-alone showers. The master suite in the main house has a king bed and opens to the terrace. Two of the other main-house bedrooms have king beds, and the other two have twin beds. The bedroom in the guest house has two twin beds.

If you’re flying to Ibiza, you’ll find it’s just an 8-minute drive from Ibiza Airport to the villa, so you can be off the plane and on a lounge by the pool in a hurry. You can also be at some of Ibiza’s best beaches in a flash; from the villa, it’s a 2 km drive to the Tropicana Beach Club on Cala Jondal, about 17 km to both Playa Bella and Ocean Beach and 24 km to Punta Galera. Shopping, dining and nightlife are a 30 km drive away in Ibiza Town.

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Palmento is a beautiful luxury home in the countryside of southeastern Sicily, situated on a private, twenty-four-acre estate near Caltagrione. Originally a winery, the vintage home has been beautifully restored and renovated into a contemporary vacation destination, featuring a heated saltwater swimming pool, two kitchens, superb living and dining areas, modern media features, and air conditioning. Four lovely bedroom suites (two in the main house, two in a guest house with its own kitchen) accommodate families and groups of friends up to eight in size.

The expansive estate features ample lawns, fruit orchards, age-old olive trees, and gardens brimming with fragrant herbs and flowers. Explore the grounds on foot or bicycle before dipping into the refreshing pool. Bask in the Mediterranean sunlight on lounge chairs overlooking the hills, and sip cool drinks under the rustic canopy. Kindle the traditional grill and fill the air with the aromas of local delicacies, and gather for alfresco feasts in the mellowing afternoon. Lovely outdoor lighting (including floodlights in the pool) invite you to linger for hours under the stars.

The main living room features comfortable modern sofas under high ceilings, with a Bose sound system and satellite TV. The adjoining dining room includes a farmhouse-style table, wood-beamed ceilings, and wide doors to the veranda. The kitchen also opens to the veranda and features chef-grade appliances for the contemporary cook. A separate den offers a haven for private downtime.

In the main house, the master bedroom features a king bed, private balcony, TV, and deluxe ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, shower, and soaking tub. The guest suite has a king bed and single-size bed, an ensuite bathroom with shower, and doors to a terrace. Both king beds features gorgeous headboards, one of which is made of an antique wine cask. The separate guesthouse has two queen suites with ensuite bathrooms.

Beyond this serene rural sanctuary, you're just twelve kilometers from the town of Caltagirone, home of the extraordinary Staircase of Santa María del Monte, among other historic splendors. Nescemi is just sixteen kilometers, and you're about forty kilometers from the coastal beaches at Gela. Catania and Mount Etna make for lovely daytrips.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Swim in the ocean at Praia do Pego and return on foot to alfresco meals and poolside relaxation at this modernist gem. Featuring unique architectural design and a superb collection of artefacts from around the world, this private home offers a unique experience of one of Portugal’s best-kept secrets: Comporta and the superb beaches stretching to its south. 

Secluded on a lush and ample estate, the villa harmonizes gracefully with the seaside landscape. Luminous interiors flow out to multiple patios and decks, including a swimming pool surrounded by sun-kissed lounge chairs. Utilize the gourmet kitchen and outdoor grill to conjure up traditional Portuguese feasts, and savor a bottle of local wine on the rooftop terrace with views of the ocean and Arrábida National Park. The unique decor pays homage to the country’s maritime  character and adventurous spirit, with objects hailing from Bali, Brazil, North Africa, Mexico, and beyond.

Although situated just south of Lisbon, Comporta has maintained a pristine, off-the-beaten path character, with well-protected beaches and large private estates. This combination has proved attractive to certain famous and well-heeled travelers seeking utter tranquility and some of the finest beaches and restaurants in Europe. In addition to Pego Beach down the road, the villa is a short drive from family-friendly Carvalhal Beach. Among the top-flight restaurants in Comporta town, the must-try spot for traditional fare is the Museu do Arroz.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sea views, modern architecture and a location just a short walk from the beach make Casa Blanca Jondal the ultimate Ibiza vacation rental. While this luxury property is tucked away in a private setting on a quiet hillside, it’s nevertheless only 10 minutes from the popular Tropicana beach and the legendary nightlife of Ibiza Town.

Watch the sun glitter on the sea from the villa’s expansive outdoor living areas, which feature an infinity pool, rows of loungers, sitting and dining areas, and a barbecue. Bring the evening’s last glass of wine up to the rooftop terrace to see the stars come out before you head inside to watch TV, put a favorite album on the sound system or share photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi.

With its crisp white color scheme, polished floors and row of sliding glass doors to the terrace, the great room of Casa Blanca Jondal is a bright, gallery-like space. Cozy up to the fireplace on the sleek sectional at one end, take a seat on dining chairs with futuristic silhouettes and buttery cognac leather or perch on a matching leather stool at the counter in the fully equipped contemporary kitchen.

Four suite-style bedrooms make this luxury property ideal for groups of up to eight friends or extended family. The villa has a master bedroom with a king bed and three bedrooms with double beds; all four have en-suite bathrooms.

A short—but steep—walk from the villa will bring you to Cala Jondal, a beach known for its clear waters and laid-back ambience, popular with everyone from families to honeymooners to the jet set. For a taste of the island’s thriving restaurant and bar scene, make the 10-minute drive into Ibiza Town; for even more options, drive a bit farther to vibrant Sant Antoni de Portmany.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This stunning luxury home is situated on the Sorrento Coast of Italy, less than twenty kilometers from Sorrento town. Perched directly above the water, the villa enjoys direct access to La Perla Beach via three flights of stairs, with tiered terraces offering ample room for outdoor relaxation. Sweeping views of the Tyrrhenian Sea inspire the entire home, from the infinity pool terrace, to the spacious veranda with alfresco dining, to the luminous interiors and bedrooms. Ideal for families, groups of friends, or destination wedding guests, the villa can accommodate up to eight travelers in total comfort.

Nestled amid lush gardens on a seafront bluff, the villa invites you to savor the open-air pleasures of this timeless coastal paradise. Bask in the Mediterranean sunlight on lovely lounge chairs, and dip into the gem-toned pool. Fire up the barbeque in the afternoon, and relish an alfresco meal in the sea-kissed breeze. Linger on the veranda in the evening, sipping local wine and marveling at the sunset over the vast horizon.

Arched stone thresholds lead into the interior living areas, infusing the home with natural light and breezes. Immaculate white surfaces glow with the daylight and sunset tones, accentuating the owners' fine art collection. The kitchen is a gourmet's dream, with high-quality appliances, beautiful wooden countertops, artisanal details, and a small breakfast bar.

The bedrooms evoke a peaceful, dreamy ambiance for afternoon siestas and nighttime slumber. Each features a queen bed, safe, TV, ensuite bathroom, and doors to a balcony or terrace with enchanting views.

In addition to La Perla Beach below the villa, you're within easy reach of Baia di Ieranto, one of the most beautiful bays along the Sorrento Coast, and an easy drive from the historic town centers of Sorrento and Positano. Pompeill and Naples are also within comfortable driving distance for day trips.

listing.listing_description:
With a prime location, private spa and personalized service, Chalet Amazon Creek is the ultimate Chamonix retreat. Set beside a creek just outside the town, this incredible property boasts breathtaking views of the Aiguille du Midi—and a location only a short drive from the Mont Blanc ski resort. Its charming interiors and five bedrooms can welcome up to ten on a ski getaway with friends or a luxury holiday with family.

Enjoy champagne, canapés and fresh flowers on arrival, daily breakfast and four-course dinners on six nights of the week. Challenge yourself on the slopes, then soothe tired muscles in a spa area with a jetted tub, hammam and sauna or relax in the home theater. If you’re visiting during the summer, take in the views of the French Alps from an expansive outdoor living area with a pool, hot tub and barbecue.

With its pitched roof and wood and stone walls, this vacation rental wholeheartedly embraces classic Alpine style. Spend evenings cozied up on chocolate leather sofas around the wood-burning fireplace in the sitting area, or satisfying après-ski appetites at the adjacent dining table. Though chef service is included in your stay, the modern kitchen is fully equipped.

The chalet has one bedroom with a queen bed and four with two twin beds each; all five have en-suite bathrooms, and the twin beds can be combined into queen beds if desired. Several of the bedrooms have their own lounge areas, terraces or mountain views—not to mention a warm, welcoming ambience.

Despite its serene wooded setting, Chalet Amazon Creek is only a short drive from the base of the Mont Blanc ski resort, home to some of Europe’s best pistes (and off-piste areas) and, for summer visitors, the beautiful Chamonix Golf Club. For tempting window shopping, a honeymoon-worthy gourmet dinner or a stroll down pretty pedestrian streets, make the short trip into downtown Chamonix.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Savor a quintessential Tuscan experience at Casale Mareli. Dating to the 19th century, this charming estate outside Lucca has been fully restored to a high standard of modern luxury—yet still retains its historic charm. Reserve this vacation rental as a base to explore the area, or simply to enjoy its peaceful setting on a farm that produces olive oil and honey.

Take in the views of the countryside and bask in a breeze scented by wildflowers from outdoor living areas that feature a pool, barbecue and al-fresco dining table. After a day of sightseeing, treat yourself to a pampering session in the indoor sauna, steam bath and hot tub, or unwind with high-tech help from the TV or Wi-Fi.

Warm, welcoming interiors encourage the whole group to gather and enjoy each other’s company. Spend a quiet moment reading in the sunroom, cozy up to the fireplace in the living room or relive the day’s adventures around the expansive table in the dining room. The kitchen is impressively equipped with a steam convection oven, blast chiller, other appliances and a breakfast table.

The five bedrooms at Casale Mareli can accommodate up to ten friends or family members. Each bedroom has a queen bed and private en-suite bathroom, making the villa a wonderful alternative to a hotel for a holiday in Tuscany, and enchanting details like antique furnishings, brick floors and beamed ceilings.

Whether you’re on a family trip, a getaway with friends or even your honeymoon, there’s plenty to delight around Casale Mareli. The villa is only a 10-minute drive from the city of Lucca, 20 minutes from Pisa and 35 minutes from the beach resort of Forte dei Marmi. If you’ll be staying during the summer, don’t miss the Festival Puccini in nearby Torre del Lago; what better place to see and hear this composer’s iconic operas than his hometown.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take a walk through the lush gardens of this picture-perfect and homely Tuscan villa, and understand why this region has the legendary reputation it has. Surrounded on all sides by the ancient but simple beauty of this part of Italy, an evening on at this hillside residence fills up the senses, as fireflies gently glow in the garden and tiny pipistrelle bats flicker across the lingering sunsets.  

Il Cole (Italian for ‘The Hill’), benefits, as the name suggests, from all the benefits of being located on an airy hillside, with refreshing breezes and ranging views over the local forests and farms. Unimpeded light filters in the bright kitchen, reflecting off the earthen tiling and raftered ceilings, while bright colours contrast subtly with the rustic, Tuscan design of this comfortable hilltop home. When the warmth of the day is at its height, dive into the refreshing cool, which is overlooked by protective, swaying cypress trees and ringed with comfortable sun-loungers. With a separate pool house, guests can enjoy their own private spaces, before gathering for a sunlit breakfast or a twilight dinner on the still-warm stones of the villa’s terrace. A bright, spacious kitchen makes food prep a pleasure, with every convenience supplied.  

Being located in the heart of one of Italy’s most renowned culinary and agricultural regions, the day-trip options for guests are numerous and downright delightful. Step into the next-door restaurant for the freshest ingredients and bursting-with-flavour wine, while the local villages of Treqanda and Sindalunga offer even more options, from traditional Italian gelato to fire-baked pizza. Further afield, guests are less than an hour from the UNESCO-listed magic of Siena’s stunning medieval Piazzo del Campo, and a similar distance from the bike paths, castles and crumbling towers that dot the shore of the azure Lake Trasimeno.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Situated outside Sitges in the heart of the Penedes wine region, this majestic villa was built in 1842 as a wine-producing estate. A modern restoration and renovation has created an extraordinary, resort-like destination in one of the most beautiful regions of Catalonia, along Spain's Mediterranean coast. Ideal for special occasions or peaceful escapes, the villa features superb living and dining areas (including an alfresco table for twenty), an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub (both saltwater), sport and entertainment areas, a sauna, a gourmet kitchen, and high-end media amenities. A five-bedroom main house and four-bedroom guesthouse accommodate families and groups up to twenty-four in size.

The villa maintains the finest aspects of its antique charm, with ochre-toned facades, beautiful masonry, and exquisite gardens and orange groves. The swimming pool (measuring 15-by-7 meters in area and 0.5–2 meters deep) is set amid lush hedges, and plentiful sun loungers, while the elevated hot tub enjoys breathaking views of the countryside. Next to the hot tub is a lovely, stand-alone cabana with lounge and fireplace. A rustic veranda casts cool shade over the alfresco dining area.

The interiors balance high-end contemporary comforts with charming bucolic features, including exposed wood ceiling beams, beautiful antique décor, and original arched threshold between rooms. French doors to the terrace breathe the fragrant air into the home. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a large wooden island for preparation and serving. The dining room seats twelve, and can be extended to seat twenty guests.

The main house features five king suites. The master suite opens to a private terrace and a large bathroom, with a soaking tub perched beside picture windows overlooking the Catalonian landscape. The guesthouse has four king suites and one suite with two double beds, along with a private lounge and kitchenette. All of the rooms enjoy shared or private terraces and ensuite bathrooms. Four single-size beds are available at extra cost.

From the rural seclusion of this vintage masia, you’re within easy reach of the beach and city of Stiges, as well as Terramar Golf Course. Barcelona is about fifty kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Rest your espresso on the garden's stone-wall and watch as the morning mist moves from the Tuscan hilltops to the valley below. When the sun rises, greet the day with a farmer's breakfast made with fresh produce from the local market. For lunch, try your hand at traditional Tuscan pizza in the oven outside. Then, treat yourself to dinner in Siena at one Gordon Ramsey's most celebrated restaurants.

Exist in solitude, a quarter-mile from the hilltown of Mensano, amongst lush gardens and Tuscan forest. Gaze upon sweeping views stretching from the southern vineyards to the bell towers of Radicondoli. Follow archways inside to feel the ancient authenticity of the groin-vaulted brick ceilings, intricate stone walls, and exposed beams. Then, finish off the picture by lighting a fire in the stone fireplace.

If you've decided to stay connected, Escaiole is outfitted with Smart TV and Wi-Fi. Daily housekeeping and a concierge service are also included. On hot afternoons, work on your vacation tan while the kids play in the pool. When it cools down at night, slide into the hot tub for a rejuvenating soak. And, if you're craving a late-night snack, fire up the barbecue and dine beneath the stars.

Tuscany is perfect for wine and wine lovers, especially in the hilltop village of Montalcino. Book yourself a tour on the Brunello di Montalcino estate, one of the world's most famous vineyards. Since you're already indulging in Italy's finer exports, make your way to San Giovanni d'Asso's Truffle Museum, set within the cellars of a 14th-century castle.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Chic meets cozy at the warm, welcoming Chalet Ambre. With luxury services, an array of shared amenities and five bedrooms, this French Alps vacation rental couldn't be more inviting at the end of a day on the slopes. Plus, its location just minutes from Val d'Isere means you're never far from a ski run, shop or restaurant.

Your holiday at the chalet includes welcome champagne, the services of a butler and housekeeper, breakfast and dinner served in-house, and afternoon snacks. Leave gear in the villa's private ski room and let tension melt away in the sauna, hammam, massage room or indoor plunge pool, or pour a glass from the wine fridge and unwind by the Apple TV and wood-burning fireplace. Guests of Chalet Ambre are also invited to use the shared restaurants, bar and wellness area at the La Mourra hotel village.

Wood-paneled rooms filled with modern pieces are a perfectly stylish blend of traditional chalet style and contemporary flair. The heart of the villa is an open-concept living and dining area with a sleek double-sided fireplace and pair of plump striped sofas; equally appealing is a fully equipped kitchen with a dramatic black stone backsplash.

The five bedrooms at Chalet Ambre, all with en-suite bathrooms, can easily accommodate groups of up to eleven friends or family members. The villa has one master bedroom with a king bed, three bedrooms with double beds, and one with two twin beds. Larger parties can also make use of a bunk bed in the twin bedroom if needed.

While it's only a few minutes' walk from the chalet to both the Val d'Isere ski base and the village, there's also a shuttle to transport guests. Spend days following the tracks of ski champions down the resort's trails, and at night, sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner or relive the adventures over drinks in a lively bar in the charming village center.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set in pastoral hills south of Lucca, this stylishly-designed villa offers charming themes and distinct character. Ringed by trees, the home’s lawns sweep down to the contemplative pool and recliner seats. Inside, liberal use of colored glass, fine art and designer furniture creates a cultured atmosphere, while countryside restaurants, Lucca’s ancient walls and famous Pisa are a short drive away.

A marriage of stimulating art and premium minimalism, Villa Glam offers all the traditional pleasures of a countryside villa but with a dose of chic fashion. Outside, stroll the circular courtyard or follow the inventive flagstones that mark pathways through the garden, before indulging in a swim in the sun-drenched pool. The grand central interior is ideal for group socializing and indulgent afternoons spent playing pool, relaxing on the easy couches, or whipping up meals in the fully-equipped kitchen. Slats of light creep through the terrace covering, where guests can choose the best spot for reading or relaxing with a tablet, with the garden hammock a much-loved feature.

A countryside villa that is removed from tourist bustle, Villa Glam nevertheless provides great access to some of the most heralded sites in all of Italy. The crumbling ancient walls, stone towers and jaw-dropping piazzas of Lucca are just a short drive away, while the sights and sounds of famous Pisa are only just a little further away. The serene beaches and charming cafes of Forte dei Marmi are also conveniently close by. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
